mapper.select: SELECT p.permission FROM sys_permission p LEFT JOIN sys_role_permission rp ON p.id = rp.permission_id LEFT JOIN sys_user_role ur ON rp.role_id = ur.role_id LEFT JOIN sys_role r ON r.id = ur.role_id WHERE p.`status` = '0' AND r.`status` = '0' AND ur.user_id = #{userid}

SELECT DISTINCT p.id, p.parent_id, p.name, p.path, p.component, p.component_name, p.visible, p.STATUS, ifnull(p.permission, '') AS permission, p.keep_alive, p.type, p.icon, p.sort, p.create_time FROM sys_permission p WHERE p.type IN (0, 1) AND p.STATUS = 0 ORDER BY p.parent_id, p.sort

SELECT DISTINCT p.id, p.parent_id, p.NAME, p.path, p.component, p.component_name, p.visible, p.STATUS, ifnull(p.permission, '') AS permission, p.keep_alive, p.type, p.icon, p.sort, p.create_time FROM sys_permission p LEFT JOIN sys_role_permission rm ON p.id = rm.permission_id LEFT JOIN sys_user_role ur ON rm.role_id = ur.role_id LEFT JOIN sys_role r ON ur.role_id = r.id LEFT JOIN sys_user u ON ur.user_id = u.id WHERE u.id = #{userId} and p.type in (0, 1) and p.status = 0 AND r.status = 0 ORDER BY p.parent_id, p.sort
